        Postconditions:

    • Method Detail

      • registerCommunity

        public java.lang.String registerCommunity(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String representantName,
                                          java.lang.String representantPhone,
                                          int population,
                                          int intChallenge,
                                          int intType)

        registerCommunty

        Description: Initializes and creates an instance of Community, saves it in the communities array and returns a success message. First, it is checked if there is a community with the same name already stored. If there is a dupicate it returns a duplicate message. Second, It checks if there is space to store a new Community in the array. If there is no space a no space message will be returend.

        Preconditions:

        • name must be a String.
        • representantName must be a String.
        • representantPhone must be a String.
        • population must be an int.
        • intChallenge must be an int between 1 and 4.
        • population must be an int between 1 and 3.

        Postconditions:

        • An instance of Community is created with all the necessary parameters, stored in the communities array and a success message is returned.
        • If there is a community with the same name already stored, a duplicate message is returned instead.
        • If there is no space to store a new community in the array, a no space message will be returned.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Community.
        representantName - The name of the person that represents the community.
        representantPhone - The phone number of the community's representant.
        population - The number of people that live in the community.
        intChallenge - The chosen option from the list of Challenge descriptions.
        intType - The chosen option from the list of CommunityType descriptions.
        Returns:
        A message stating if the community was registered successfully or not (stating the reason if it wasn't successfull).

      • registerPlace

        public java.lang.String registerPlace(int intCommunity,
                                      java.lang.String placeName,
                                      double area,
                                      java.util.Calendar inaugurationDate,
                                      java.lang.String photo,
                                      double resources,
                                      int intDepartment,
                                      int intType)

        registerPlace

        Description: Initializes and creates an instance of Place, saves it in the places array and returns a success message. First, it checks if there is atleast one community registered. If not, a no prexistent community message is returned. Second, it changes the int option entered for community and then extracts the entire community. Third, it is checked if there is a place with the same name already stored. If there is a duplicate it returns a duplicate message. Finally, It checks if there is space to store a new placein the array. If there is no space a no space message will be returend.

        Preconditions:

        • intCommunity must be a int.
        • placeName must be a String.
        • area must be a double.
        • inaugurationDate must be a Calendar Type.
        • photo must be a String.
        • resources must be a double.
        • intDepartment must be an int between 1 and 4.
        • intType must be an int between 1 and 3.

        Postconditions:

        • An instance of place is created with all the necessary parameters, stored in the palces array and a success message is returned.
        • If there are no prexistent communities registered, a message will be returned.
        • If there is a palce with the same name already stored, a duplicate message is returned instead.
        • If there is no space to store a new place in the array, a no space message will be returned.
        Parameters:
        intCommunity - int the represents one of the options of the existing communities.
        placeName - The name of the place.
        area - The area that the place covers in km2.
        inaugurationDate - Date the the place is going to be inaugurated.
        photo - URL of a photo of the place.
        resources - The amount of money that is invested in a places.
        intDepartment - int that represents one of the possible departments to be chosen from.
        intType - int that represents one of the possible place types to be chosen from.
        Returns:
        A message stating if the community was registered successfully or not (stating the reason if it wasn't successfull).

      • addProduct

        public java.lang.String addProduct(int intCommunity,
                                   java.lang.String productName,
                                   double naturePercent,
                                   java.lang.String handcraft,
                                   int intProductType)

        addProduct

        Description: Associates a new product with the specified community and returns a success message. First, it retrieves the community based on the provided index. Then, it creates a new Product instance using the provided parameters. Finally, it associates the new product with the specified community.

        Preconditions:

        • intCommunity must be an int representing an existing community.
        • productName must be a non-null String.
        • naturePercent must be a double.
        • handcraft must be "yes" or "no" String.
        • intProductType must be an int representing the type of the product.

        Postconditions:

        • A Product instance is created with all the necessary parameters, associated with the specified community, and a success message is returned.
        Parameters:
        intCommunity - The index of the community where the product will be associated.
        productName - The name of the product.
        naturePercent - The percentage of natural products used to make the product.
        handcraft - Stating if the product was handcrafted or not
        intProductType - The type of the product.
        Returns:
        A message stating if the product was added successfully or not. The appropiate message is returned after other checks in the Community.addProduct(Product)

      • deleteProduct

        public java.lang.String deleteProduct(int intCommunity,
                                      int intProduct)

        deleteProduct

        Description: Helps in the process of deleting a product from the specified community and returns a message indicating success or failure. The method retrieves the community based on the provided index and passes is on to Community.deleteProduct(int) to actually delete it.

        Preconditions:

        • intCommunity must be an int representing an existing community.
        • intProduct must be an int representing an existing product within the community.

        Postconditions:

        • If the product is successfully deleted, a success message is returned.
        • If the specified community or product does not exist, an appropriate error message is returned.
        Parameters:
        intCommunity - The index of the community from which the product will be deleted.
        intProduct - The index of the product to be deleted within the community.
        Returns:
        A message indicating if the product was successfully deleted or not.

      • searchCommunity

        public boolean searchCommunity(java.lang.String name)

        searchCommunity

        Description: Verifies if the entered community name already exists in the array of communities. It will loop along all the existing communities.

        Preconditions:

        • Array holding the Communities must already exist.
        • name has to be a String.

        Postconditions:

        • A boolean stating if a duplicate was found or not.
        Parameters:
        name - the String entered for the community that wants to be registered.
        Returns:
        A boolean showing if there is a duplicate or not.

      • searchPlace

        public boolean searchPlace(java.lang.String name)

        searchPlace

        Description: Verifies if the entered place name already exists in the array of places. It will loop along all the existing places.

        Preconditions:

        • Array holding the Communities must already exist.
        • name has to be a String.

        Postconditions:

        • A boolean stating if a duplicate was found or not.
        Parameters:
        name - the String entered for the place that wants to be registered.
        Returns:
        A boolean showing if there is a duplicate or not.

      • availableCommunity

        public int availableCommunity()

        availableCommunity

        Description: Verifies if there is an empty space in the array of communities in order to save another community afterwards. It will loop an check that every element is equals to Null and then return the index of the last Null element. If there are no null elements, it will return a -1.

        Preconditions:

        • Array holding the Communities must already exist.

        Postconditions:

        • An int holding the last null element position in the communities array will be returned. If there is no null element left -1 will be returned instead.
        Returns:
        An int holding the index of the last null element in the communities array (if there is no more space a -1 will be returned).

      • availablePlace

        public int availablePlace()

        availablePlace

        Description: Verifies if there is an empty space in the array of places in order to save another place afterwards. It will loop and check that every element is equals to Null and then return the index of the last Null element. If there are no null elements, it will return a -1.

        Preconditions:

        • Array holding the places must already exist.

        Postconditions:

        • An int holding the last null element position in the places array will be returned. If there is no null element left -1 will be returned instead.
        Returns:
        An int holding the index of the last null element in the places array (if there is no more space a -1 will be returned).

      • displayChallengeTypes

        public java.lang.String displayChallengeTypes()

        displayChallengeTypes

        Description: Concatenates and returns a string that holds all the descriptions that represent every Challenge literal. It will loop, put a number and extract the String challenges that holds all the descriptions.

        Preconditions:

        • literals and descriptions must have been initialized and the getDescription method must be in place.

        Postconditions:

        • A String holding all the numbered descriptions in order will be returned.
        Returns:
        A String that holds all the numbered descriptions of the Challenge enumeration.

      • displayCommunityTypes

        public java.lang.String displayCommunityTypes()

        displayCommunityTypes

        Description: Concatenates and returns a string that holds all the descriptions that represent every CommunityType literal. It will loop, put a number and extract the String communityTypes that holds all the descriptions.

        Preconditions:

        • literals and descriptions must have been initialized and the getDescription method must be in place.

        Postconditions:

        • A String holding all the numbered descriptions in order will be returned.
        Returns:
        A String that holds all the numbered descriptions of the CommunityType enumeration.

        public java.lang.String displayDepartments()

        Preconditions:

        • literals and descriptions must have been initialized and the getDescription method must be in place.

        Postconditions:

        • A String holding all the numbered descriptions in order will be returned.
        Returns:

      • displayPlaceTypes

        public java.lang.String displayPlaceTypes()

        • A String holding all the numbered descriptions in order will be returned.

      • displayProductTypes

        public java.lang.String displayProductTypes()

        displayProductTypes

        Description: Concatenates and returns a string that holds all the descriptions that represent every ProductType literal. It will loop through the product types, put a number, and extract the String array containing all the descriptions.

        Preconditions:

        • literals and descriptions must have been initialized and the getDescription method must be in place.

        Postconditions:

        • A String holding all the numbered descriptions in order will be returned.
        Returns:
        A String that holds all the numbered descriptions of the ProductType enumeration.

      • displayCommunities

        public java.lang.String displayCommunities()

        displayCommunities

        Description: Concatenates and returns a string that holds all the names of the available communities. It iterates through the communities array, appending the index and name of each community to the message. It makes sure that no null community is passed on to prevent a Null Exception.

        Preconditions:

        • communities must have been initialized.

        Postconditions:

        • A string containing all the numbered names of the available communities is returned.
        Returns:
        A string holding all the numbered names of the available communities.

      • displayProducts

        public java.lang.String displayProducts(Community community)

        displayProducts

        Description: Concatenates and returns a string that holds all the descriptions of products associated with the specified community. It delegates the task of displaying products to the Community.displayProducts() method by passing the selected community.

        Preconditions:

        • The community parameter must be a valid instance of the Community class.

        Postconditions:

        • A string containing all the descriptions of products associated with the specified community is returned.
        Parameters:
        community - The community whose products are to be displayed.
        Returns:
        A string holding all the names of products associated with the specified community.

      • oneMinCommunity

        public boolean oneMinCommunity()

        oneMinCommunity

        Description: Will check if at least one community was registered already (first position of communities).

        Preconditions:

        • Array of communities must already exist.

        Postconditions:

        • A boolean stating if the first position in the community array was occupied or not.
        Returns:
        A boolean stating if the first position of communities is filled.

      • oneMinProduct

        public boolean oneMinProduct(Community community)

        oneMinProduct

        Description: Checks if the specified community has at least one product registered. It delegates the task of checking to the Community.oneMinProduct() method by giving it the selected community.

        Preconditions:

        • The community parameter must be a valid instance of the Community class.

        Postconditions:

        • A boolean value indicating whether the specified community has at least one product registered inse a communities inventory or not is returned.
        Parameters:
        community - The community to check for the existence of at least one product.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if the specified community has at least one product registered.

      • intToCommunity

        public Community intToCommunity(int intCommunity)

        intToCommunity

        Description: Takes in the selected option from the list of communities and then extracts the community in the communities array.

        Preconditions:

        • intType must be an int within the range of communities printed.

        Postconditions:

        • A community is returned that was associated to the entered option.
        Parameters:
        intCommunity - an int that the user entered to choose one of the communities.
        Returns:
        The community that was selected from the community list.

      • getCommunities

        public Community[] getCommunities()

        getCommunities

        Description: Retrieves the array of communities saved in controller.

        Preconditions:

        • Array of communities must be in place beforehand.

        Postconditions:

        • An array of communities is returned containing all available communities.
        Returns:
        The array of communities (including nulls if there are any).
